item.title: Report X-2024120694
item.description:
Report X-2024120694

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-05
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: REPORTED TO DOOR 109. WEARING PROPER PPE USED THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS FOR CORROSIVE. BOX WAS ON THE ROLLER LINE. THERE WAS A SMALL WET SPOT ON THE TOP OF THE BOX. NO LIQUID ON THE FLOOR NO NEED FOR ZEP ZORBENT. PLACED THE BOX IN A GREEN PLASTIC DMP BAG AND REMOVED IT TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
